text: @bennyjohnson @WHO @DrTedros The WHO is a cancer that needs to be removed. Tedros selected as a WHO goodwill ambassador.....wait for it....ROBERT MUGABE....one of the few people to have ended more lives than Covid19. https://t.co/jD7JZAtLHq
